explains: n. 桃花心木，红木；红褐色

sentences.en: "It is a mahogany splinter, "said the other.
The word "mahogany" can be understood, in Danish, as having two meanings.
sentences.cn: “红木”这个词在丹麦语中，可以理解为有两个意思。

sentences.en: There the people become quite a mahogany brown, and in the hottest lands they are burnt to Negroes.
sentences.cn: 在那儿，人们的皮肤都变成了红褐色，在最热的地方，他们就被烧成黑人了。
